message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $13,000. I believe this price reflects the value it holds for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but the product is quite valuable and $10,000 is cutting it a bit close to my bottom line. How about we meet in the middle at $11,500?
I'm getting closer to your price, but I still think $11,500 is a bit steep. How about we meet at $11,000? I'm willing to make a serious commitment to buy the product if we can agree on this price.
